languages.text: The Arch-Militant loses −10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} at the begginging of each turn. Can be removed by healing.

traits.locale_text: The Arch-Militant loses 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} at the begginging of each turn. Can be removed by healing.

languages.text: At the start of their turn, the Arch-Militant suffers direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This effect can be removed by healing.
languages.original_text: В начале каждого своего хода архмилитант получает прямой урон, равный 10% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}. Этот эффект можно снять с помощью лечения.

traits.locale_text: At the start of their turn, the Arch-Militant loses −10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This effect can be removed by healing.
At the start of their turn, the Arch-Militant suffers direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This effect can be removed by healing.
At the start of their turn, the Arch-Militant suffers direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This effect can be removed by healing.

languages.text: В начале каждого своего хода архмилитант получает прямой урон, равный 10% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}. Этот эффект можно снять с помощью лечения.
languages.original_text: At the start of their turn, the Arch-Militant suffers direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This effect can be removed by healing.

traits.locale_text: В начале каждого своего хода архмилитант теряет 10% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}. Этот эффект можно снять с помощью лечения.

languages.text: Başmilitan, turu başladığında {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %10'u kadar doğrudan hasara maruz kalır. Bu etki, iyileştirme ile ortadan kaldırılabilir.
languages.original_text: At the start of their turn, the Arch-Militant suffers direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This effect can be removed by healing.

traits.locale_text: Başmilitan, turu başladığında {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %10'u kadar doğrudan hasara maruz kalır. Bu etki, iyileştirme ile ortadan kaldırılabilir.

languages.text: Al comienzo de su turno, el Archimilitante sufre tanto daño directo como el 10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}. Este efecto se puede eliminar con curación.
languages.original_text: At the start of their turn, the Arch-Militant suffers direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This effect can be removed by healing.

traits.locale_text: Al comienzo de su turno, el Archimilitante sufre tanto daño directo como el 10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}. Este efecto se puede eliminar con curación.

languages.text: 首席战士在回合开始时会受到直击伤害，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的10%。此效果可以通过治疗移除。
languages.original_text: At the start of their turn, the Arch-Militant suffers direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This effect can be removed by healing.

traits.locale_text: 首席战士在回合开始时会受到直击伤害，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的10%。此效果可以通过治疗移除。

languages.text: Au début de son tour, l'archimilitant subit des dégâts directs égaux à 10 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}. Cet effet peut être supprimé par des soins.
languages.original_text: At the start of their turn, the Arch-Militant suffers direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This effect can be removed by healing.

traits.locale_text: Au début de son tour, l'archimilitant subit des dégâts directs égaux à 10 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}. Cet effet peut être supprimé par des soins.

languages.text: ターン開始時、アーク・ミリタントは{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の10%に相当する直接ダメージを受ける。この効果はあらゆる回復手段で打ち消すことができる。
languages.original_text: At the start of their turn, the Arch-Militant suffers direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This effect can be removed by healing.

traits.locale_text: ターン開始時、アーク・ミリタントは{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の10%に相当する直接ダメージを受ける。この効果はあらゆる回復手段で打ち消すことができる。

languages.text: Zu Beginn seiner Runde erleidet der Erzmilitant direkten Schaden in Höhe von 10 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}. Dieser Effekt kann durch Heilung nicht entfernt werden.
languages.original_text: At the start of their turn, the Arch-Militant suffers direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This effect can be removed by healing.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn seiner Runde erleidet der Erzmilitant direkten Schaden in Höhe von 10 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}. Dieser Effekt kann durch Heilung nicht entfernt werden.
